external_games.name: Shadow: Treachery cannot be tolerated-episode 2: retaliation

name: Shadow: Treachery Cannot Be Tolerated - Episode 2: Retaliation
summary: After Shadow takes her revenge she gets to know that one of her men is arrested and he is about to rat her out. She determines to stop him and also promises her boyfriend that it will be her last crime after this she will leave behind her life of crimes.
